extension_name.description: FocusTube is a lightweight, efficient browser extension designed to enhance your YouTube viewing experience by automatically skipping intrusive video ads. Stay focused, save valuable time, and enjoy uninterrupted content seamlessly.

extension_description.message: Enhance and streamline your YouTube usage by seamlessly skipping ads, toggling custom embeds, and customizing your viewing experience with advanced controls.
extension_description.description: Ad-Free Viewing: Automatically skips video ads without interruptions. Privacy-Focused: No tracking or user data collection. Easy to Use: Activate once, and FocusTube does the rest. Compatible: Works smoothly with the latest versions of popular browsers. Enjoy distraction-free YouTube videosâ€”install FocusTube and reclaim your viewing experience
